cities.name: Mexico City, Mexico
cities.description: Unleash your spirit in Mexico City: Where ancient history meets vibrant culture!

cities.name: Gaudalajara, Mexico
cities.description: Discover Guadalajara: The heart of mariachi and the birthplace of tequila!

cities.name: Paris, France
cities.description: Fall in love with Paris: The City of Light, where every corner tells a story!

cities.name: Cannes , France
cities.description: Experience glamour in Cannes: Where the stars shine bright on the French Riviera!

cities.name: Casablanca, Morroco
cities.description: Discover Casablanca: Where rich history meets vibrant modernity in Morocco's cultural capital!

cities.name: Marrakech, Morroco
cities.description: Immerse yourself in Marrakech: A vibrant tapestry of colors, spices, and timeless traditions!

temples.name: Teotihuacan, Mexico
temples.description: Explore Teotihuacan: Walk the ancient pathways of the City of Gods!

temples.name: Chichen Itza, Mexico
temples.description: Unravel the mysteries of Chichen Itza: A timeless wonder of the ancient Mayan world!

beaches.name: Cancun, Mexico
beaches.description: Escape to Cancun: Paradise awaits with sun-kissed beaches and crystal-clear waters!

beaches.name: Ixtapa, Mexico
beaches.description: Relax in Ixtapa: Your tropical haven of sun-soaked beaches and lush landscapes!
